<script>
(function() {
  // Experience definitions
  const experiences = [
    { id: 'is-this-ai', name: 'Is This AI?', emoji: 'ğŸ”', subtitle: 'Detection & Awareness' },
    { id: 'what-would-you-do', name: 'What Would You Do?', emoji: 'ğŸ¤”', subtitle: 'Ethics & Dilemmas' },
    { id: 'rules-of-engagement', name: 'Rules of Engagement', emoji: 'ğŸ“‹', subtitle: 'Policy & Governance' },
    { id: 'ai-proof-assessments', name: 'AI-Proof Your Assessments', emoji: 'ğŸ›¡ï¸', subtitle: 'Assessment Design' },
    { id: 'teaching-with-ai', name: 'Working WITH AI', emoji: 'ğŸ¤', subtitle: 'Co-Creation & Integration' }
  ];

  // Badge definitions
  const badges = [
    { id: 'explorer', emoji: 'ğŸ§ª', name: 'Explorer', requirement: 1 },
    { id: 'thinker', emoji: 'ğŸ§ ', name: 'Thinker', requirement: 3 },
    { id: 'builder', emoji: 'ğŸ› ï¸', name: 'Builder', requirement: 5 },
    { id: 'champion', emoji: 'ğŸ†', name: 'Champion', requirement: 6 } // 5 + workshop
  ];

  // Get completions from localStorage
  function getCompletions() {
    try {
      return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ai-passport-completions') || '{}');
    } catch (e) {
      return {};
    }
  }

  // Count completed experiences
  function countCompleted() {
    const completions = getCompletions();
    return experiences.filter(exp => completions[exp.id]).length;
  }

  // Check for workshop attendance (stored separately)
  function hasWorkshopBadge() {
    try {
      return localStorage.getItem('ai-passport-workshop') === 'true';
    } catch (e) {
      return false;
    }
  }

  // Render badge display
  function renderBadges() {
    const container = document.getElementById('badge-display');
    const completedCount = countCompleted();
    const hasWorkshop = hasWorkshopBadge();
    const totalForChampion = completedCount + (hasWorkshop ? 1 : 0);

    let badgeHtml = '';
    let earnedCount = 0;

    badges.forEach(badge => {
      const earned = (badge.id === 'champion')
        ? (completedCount >= 5 && hasWorkshop)
        : completedCount >= badge.requirement;

      if (earned) earnedCount++;

      badgeHtml += `
        <div style="text-align: center; opacity: ${earned ? '1' : '0.3'}; transition: opacity 0.3s;">
          <div style="font-size: 48px; ${earned ? '' : 'filter: grayscale(100%);'}">${badge.emoji}</div>
          <div style="font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; color: ${earned ? '#E2E8F0' : '#94A3B8'}; margin-top: 4px;">${badge.name}</div>
          ${earned ? '<div style="font-size: 11px; color: #22C55E;">âœ“ Earned</div>' : ''}
        </div>
      `;
    });

    container.innerHTML = badgeHtml;
    document.getElementById('stat-badges').textContent = earnedCount;

    // Update message
    const messageEl = document.getElementById('badge-message');
    if (completedCount === 0) {
      messageEl.innerHTML = 'Complete your first experience to earn the <strong>ğŸ§ª Explorer</strong> badge!';
    } else if (completedCount < 3) {
      messageEl.innerHTML = `${3 - completedCount} more experience${3 - completedCount > 1 ? 's' : ''} to earn <strong>ğŸ§  Thinker</strong>`;
    } else if (completedCount < 5) {
      messageEl.innerHTML = `${5 - completedCount} more experience${5 - completedCount > 1 ? 's' : ''} to earn <strong>ğŸ› ï¸ Builder</strong>`;
    } else if (!hasWorkshop) {
      messageEl.innerHTML = 'All experiences complete! Attend a workshop to earn <strong>ğŸ† Champion</strong>';
    } else {
      messageEl.innerHTML = 'ğŸ‰ <strong>Congratulations!</strong> You\'ve earned all badges!';
    }
  }

  // Render experience list
  function renderExperiences() {
    const container = document.getElementById('experience-list');
    const completions = getCompletions();

    let html = '';
    experiences.forEach((exp, index) => {
      const completion = completions[exp.id];
      const isComplete = !!completion;
      const completedDate = completion ? new Date(completion.completedAt).toLocaleDateString() : null;

      html += `
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 16px; padding: 16px 20px; background: ${isComplete ? '#0D2818' : '#16162A'}; border: 1px solid ${isComplete ? '#1A4731' : '#2D2D4A'}; border-radius: 10px;">
          <span style="font-size: 28px;">${exp.emoji}</span>
          <div style="flex: 1;">
            <div style="font-weight: bold; color: #E2E8F0;">${index + 1}. ${exp.name}</div>
            <div style="font-size: 13px; color: #64748B;">${exp.subtitle}</div>
          </div>
          <div style="text-align: right;">
            ${isComplete
              ? `<div style="color: #22C55E; font-weight: bold;">âœ“ Complete</div>
                 <div style="font-size: 12px; color: #64748B;">${completedDate}</div>`
              : `<div style="color: #94A3B8;">Not started</div>`
            }
          </div>
        </div>
      `;
    });

    container.innerHTML = html;

    // Update stats
    const completedCount = countCompleted();
    document.getElementById('stat-completed').textContent = completedCount;
    document.getElementById('stat-remaining').textContent = 5 - completedCount;
  }

  // Initialize
  renderBadges();
  renderExperiences();

  // Refresh on focus (in case user completed something in another tab)
  window.addEventListener('focus', function() {
    renderBadges();
    renderExperiences();
  });
})();
</script>
